name: Vivanta by Taj - M G Road, Bangalore

reviews.text: We had gone for holiday to Bangalore so location was our prime criteria.Taj Vivanta is centrally located close to major shopping arcades.
reviews.title: Great Location Great service

reviews.text: Although the rooms were ordinary but Taj service was immaculate.We enjoyed our chinese meal at memories of China and the spa experience in Jiva spa
reviews.title: Always a welcome home away from home

reviews.text: Breakfast spread was delightful
reviews.title: comfortable stay

reviews.text: Been a regular at Taj Residency (still cant call it Vivanta:)) - been staying here for over 18years now! Very centrally located especially if mtgs are in and around MG road. Lovely cuisine offerings across various restaurants to chose from- and we'd gravitate invariably always to the coffee shop past midnight for a heavenly chole bhature:)
reviews.title: What a business hotel should be

reviews.text: I had stayed in this hotel during my Business trip. I would describe it as a very pleasant and refreshing experience in middle of some hectic business meetings. Not only my room but the entire premises of the hotel were very well maintained and the fragrances in my rooms very particularly had a soothing affect.
reviews.title: Warm service in a difficult location

reviews.text: Stayed here for four nights. The only negatives about the hotel was the bed - extremely hard/firm, prefer a firm bed, but at least one that is soft to touch, and the TV lacked a western news channel - BBC was on the menu but didn't work.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel, would stay again.
peace and love
reviews.text: Hotel restaurants were very good, the hotel even serves beef. The best meal in India I had in about 12 days occured in the main upscale restaurant. The chinese restaurant and main restaurant were good as well.

i booked this hotel for the nightstay....and this hotel is ultimate..people are so friendly over here.every facility is available here and they have ice bar which is amazing specailly the dj over there mr.vanshi.they play very good music and the party is always awesome over there.i think if u have to experience night life in bangalore then ice bar which is in taj vivanta mg road is the best place to be in........and the food in this hotel is awesome. i mean ur taste buds will salive like anything....u take it from chinese to indian to continental food....its awesome....this is for sure if next time i visit bangalore with anyone,the first place this would be to go in.......specially the ice bar which is ultimate place to party on this planet
reviews.title: great place at a great location

reviews.text: thankyou
reviews.title: Great place-great value

reviews.text: + its on M G Road, abs in heart of city at a great location
reviews.title: Superb!

reviews.text: I have stayed at the Taj Bangalore four times for business and it never fails to impress. Its such a clean fantastic hotel with great rooms, lovely food, pool, balconies and amazing service and such a lovely respite from the heat and crowds of bangalore. Rooms are modern, spacious and well maintained. always nice to have a balcony to take in the atmosphere of busy MG road. I love the free cookies provided in your room in the afternoon. The staff are always so friendly and helpful particularly Nazim who is always so welcoming. Great gym facilities too and love the food from the restaurants and great wine and nibbles from the bar.
reviews.title: Love the Taj Bangalore

reviews.text: We travelled to Bangalore planning to renew our wedding vows at one of the temples. The arrangements made with the hotel and the hotel priest however did not work very well and there was a very rushed process when we arrived to have this arranged. Alos the Hotel had an event outside that played loud music late into the night and did not cater for guests that wanted to rest. The rooms were clean but a little small. The food at the hotel was good, but they could not cater for guests that wanted food from the differnt restaurant at the one sitting - unlike some of the other Taj hotels - so we had to dine where the kids could be accomodated.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel - need to plan events better

reviews.text: We have stayed at many hotels since last five years all over india, often luxury ones with impeccable details and fantastic designs. Price-wise Taj Vivanta is good.
reviews.title: Good for Service and comfort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is the perceptive and friendly service that makes it worthwhile staying.
reviews.title: Amazing and Incredible Taj

reviews.text: We stayed for two days. Service is really good. Room ambeince is good.Only location is little bit far away form Airport. Other wise location wise in city is excellent. Food quality is good.
reviews.title: A Great value to stay

reviews.text: Taj was symbolic in Bangalore on MG Road, however with passing time the hotel is just an average hotel. The location is still great for shopping , business however the hotel is loosing its sheen. The hotel however has got good food. A decent hotel for business travellers. Too noisy with metro work on MG Road.
reviews.title: Great hotel at one time, going down

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 6 nights and used it as a base for attending Cricket World Cup matches. On the second day I walked into one of the many pillars in the lobby (all of which have extremely sharp edges) and sustained a serious cut over my eye. The response of the staff was magnificent. They provided a car and staff to accompany us to the Hospital and arranged everything there for us as I had four stitches inserted. We must especically mention the Concierge supervisor Reddeppa Naidu who looked after us so well.Generally the staff were very helpful, cheerful and friendly. Sunil in the Ice Bar was brillant. Only negative was the outrageous rates charged for Wi-Fi in our room. On our trip to India we stayed at three Taj hotels and this same problem applied to all of them. Come on Taj (owned by tech giant Tata) stop this silly over charging for what is now a basic free service in most hotels worldwide.
reviews.title: Expensive but excellent

reviews.text: Make sure you go to the Graze restaurant in the hotel. The food was absolutely exquisite. True 5 star dining!!! Who would think you could find such good food in Bangalore.
reviews.title: Nice hotel in a good location

reviews.text: Shankar-Saranjibi was very creative in his presentation and the taste was different with each mouthful. The delicious mushroom tortellini and the melon sorbet were wonderful. The final offering of chocolate truffles was decadent!
reviews.title: amazing staff

reviews.text: I only wich I was there for a few more days to dine there again.
reviews.title: Like all Taj properties rapidly in decline!

aka: Vivanta By Taj - m g Road, Bangalore Hotel Bangalore
description: Soak in the space that's bang in the centre of Bangalore's business and entertainment areas. Drive in from the airport delighting in backseat surprises (we're not revealing here). You'll see how we mean business in a quiet efficient way from the moment you step in. Our lobby is a unique mix of chic and classic. This arrival zone sets the tone for guestrooms and banquet facilities that deliver the ultimate in urban relaxation.
